name: SHR GenderIdentityCS CodeSystem
title: SHR GenderIdentityCS CodeSystem
publisher: The MITRE Corporation: Standard Health Record Collaborative

concept.display: Identifies as male, exclusively, usually, or primarily
concept.definition: Identifies as male, exclusively, usually, or primarily

concept.display: Identifies as female, exclusively, usually, or primarily
concept.definition: Identifies as female, exclusively, usually, or primarily

concept.display: Does not identify with any gender
concept.definition: Does not identify with any gender

concept.display: Identifies with both male and female genders, either simultaneously, or changing fluidly over time
concept.definition: Identifies with both male and female genders, either simultaneously, or changing fluidly over time

concept.display: Uncertain or searching for gender identity
concept.definition: Uncertain or searching for gender identity

concept.display: Male (at birth) who identifies as a female
concept.definition: Male (at birth) who identifies as a female

concept.display: Female (at birth) who identifies as a male
concept.definition: Female (at birth) who identifies as a male
